entries.assassin_target_location: Your target has been detected %DI meters to the %TO.
entries.bounty_already_tracking: You are already tracking your target.
entries.bounty_no_ability: You do not understand how to use this item.
entries.bounty_no_mission: You must accept a bounty mission before you can use a probe droid.
entries.bounty_no_signature: You must go speak with your informant before you can track your target.
entries.crafting_already_dropped_off: Why are you still here? Shoo. You got your reward, now go away.
entries.crafting_already_picked_up: Why are you still here? My friend is waiting for that item. Put it together and deliver it like you agreed to.
entries.crafting_components_received: The necessary components and schematic have been transferred to you. Use your generic crafting tool to craft the item.
entries.crafting_instructions: Drag and drop the crafted item onto the target NPC.
entries.crafting_mission_start: Go to the waypoint and talk to the NPC. They will give you the schematic and necessary components.
entries.deliver_already_dropped_off: What now? You got your reward, I got my item. Go away.
entries.deliver_already_picked_up: Why are you still here? Go deliver that item like you're supposed to and quit bothering me.
entries.deliver_incorrect_player_0: You know who's not talking to you? Me. I'm waiting for someone to do me a favor, and it's not you. Go away.
entries.deliver_incorrect_player_1: No way. I'm not talking to you. I'm waiting for someone to do me a favor and it's not you.
entries.deliver_incorrect_player_2: Do I have anything for you to do... Nope... I'm waiting for someone else.
entries.deliver_incorrect_player_3: I don't want to buy anything you might be selling. As a matter of fact, I don't even want to talk to you.
entries.deliver_incorrect_player_4: Just stop talking right there. I'm not waiting here for you, and I don't want to talk to you.
entries.destroy_return: Target Destroyed! Return to your contact to receive your reward.
entries.droid_buy_no_space: You need more inventory space to buy a droid.
entries.droid_buy_nsf: You do not have enough credits to purchase this droid.
entries.droid_probot_buy_confirmation: Do you wish to purchase an Imperial Probe Droid for 1000 credits?
entries.droid_purchase_complete: A droid has been purchased and placed in your inventory.
entries.droid_purchase_prompt: Choose the type of probe droid you wish to purchase:
entries.droid_seeker_buy_confirmation: Do you wish to purchase a Seeker Probe Droid for 200 credits?
entries.escort_follow_again: I will continue to follow you.
entries.give_item: What are you waiting for? Give me that item.
entries.group_expanded: Group Mission Success! Reward credits have been transmitted to the bank account of all group members in the immediate area.  They have been recalculated to reflect the newly added members.
entries.group_success: Group Mission Success! Reward credits have been transmitted to the bank account of all group members in the immediate area.
entries.group_too_far: Mission Alert! Some group members are too far away from the group to receive their reward and are not eligible for reward.
entries.hunting_kills_remaining: You must kill %DI more %TO to complete your mission.
entries.informant_no_bounty_mission: You don't appear to be currently working for the guild. Come back and talk to me after you get a job.
entries.informant_not_bounty_hunter: You're not a member of the Bounty Hunter guild. Go talk to someone who cares.
entries.mission_incomplete_01: CEASE SUSPICIOUS ACTIVITY AT ONCE! The Galactic Empire regrets to inform you that your employer's activities have come under suspicion. You will receive compensation deemed fair by the Empire.
entries.mission_incomplete_02: ARREST NOTICE: Your employer's funds have been frozen due to charges of conspiracy. Reports indicate that you are not directly involved at the moment, therefore you will be reimbursed for your time.
entries.mission_incomplete_03: CEASE AND DESIST: The Imperial Security Bureau demands that your employment be terminated immediately. Your employer has been informed of this change in plans. Mention this to no one!
entries.mission_incomplete_04: CONTRACT REVOKED! An arrest warrant has been issued for your employer. You are hereby ordered by the Empire abort your mission immediately. You will be partially credited for your mission in exchange for your cooperation.
entries.mission_incomplete_05: MISSION LICENSE DISSOLVED! Your employer submitted inappropriate forms for this mission. Therefore, the Empire cannot allow your mission to continue. Your employer has agreed to offer partial payment, however.
entries.no_assassin_mission: You do not have an assassination target currently.
entries.no_assassin_target: You must get closer to the designated area before this item can lock onto your target.
entries.not_bounty_hunter_terminal: You are not authorized to use this terminal.
entries.npc_job_accept_response_yes: Report back to me after you have completed your task.
entries.npc_job_none_available: I have nothing for you to do right now.
entries.npc_job_request_already_have: You already have a task from me. Complete it and then we'll talk again.
entries.npc_job_request_no_job: I have nothing for you to do right now.
entries.npc_job_request_wrong_difficulty: You need to be more skilled before you can work for me.
entries.npc_on_other_mission: You must finish your other work before you can help me.
entries.out_in_space: You are unable to track your opponent while out in space.
entries.probe_droid_arrival: Probe Droid has landed and is awaiting biological signature programming.
entries.probe_droid_arrival_5: Probe Droid Launched. Prepare for arrival in 5.
entries.probe_droid_bad_location: You must move to a different area to call down a probe droid from orbit.
entries.probe_droid_launch_prep: Probe Droid request received. Prepping capsule for launch. Please wait at your current location. Estimated arrival time: 20 seconds.
entries.probe_droid_takeoff: Target data received. Commencing interplanetary search pattern.  This may take a few minutes...
entries.probe_droid_too_many: You cannot launch another probe droid.
entries.recon_return: Recon Completed. Return to your contact to receive your reward.
entries.seeker_droid_launched: Biological scan received. Commencing planetary search pattern. Please stand by for tracking data.
entries.success: Mission complete! Your reward has been placed in your bank account.
entries.success_w_amount: Mission complete! Your reward of %DI credits has been placed in your bank account.
entries.survey_start: You must find a resource pocket of the specified type and efficiency at least 1024 meters away from the mission giver.
entries.survey_too_close: That resource pocket is too close (%DF meters) to the mission giver to be useful to them. Go find one at least %DI meters away to complete your survey mission.
entries.target_continue_tracking: Your probe droid will continue to report last known target location.
entries.target_located_corellia: Your target has been located on Corellia.
entries.target_located_dantooine: Your target has been located on Dantooine.
entries.target_located_dathomir: Your target has been located on Dathomir.
entries.target_located_dungeon1: Your target is hiding somewhere, most likely under ground or in space. You will have to try again later.
entries.target_located_endor: Your target has been located on Endor.
entries.target_located_lok: Your target has been located on Lok.
entries.target_located_naboo: Your target has been located on Naboo.
entries.target_located_rori: Your target has been located on Rori.
entries.target_located_taanab: Your target has been located on Taanab.
entries.target_located_talus: Your target has been located on Talus.
entries.target_located_tatooine: Your target has been located on Tatooine.
entries.target_located_yavin4: Your target has been located on Yavin IV.
entries.target_location_updated: Mission Target found by probe droid. Mission Waypoint updated.
entries.target_not_found_1: Your probe droid exploded en-route and failed to find your target.
entries.target_not_found_2: Your probe droid was destroyed by a mynock and did not find your target.
entries.target_not_found_3: Your droid was struck by a meteorite and failed to find your target.
entries.target_not_found_4: Your probe droid ran out of energy and failed to find your target.
entries.target_not_found_5: Your probe droid malfunctioned and did not find your target.
entries.target_not_found_6: Your probe droid was eaten by a space slug and did not find your target.
entries.target_not_on_planet: Your target's biological signature was not detected on this planet.
entries.target_track_lost: Your probe droid lost track of your target.
entries.too_many_missions: You cannot accept any more missions.
entries.wrong_item: Well? You're supposed to be making me an item.. Come back after you've built it.
entries.no_seek_kashyyyk: Due to the unusually high number of life signs on Kashyyyk, your droid is unable to pinpoint your target.
entries.timed_out: CONTRACT REVOKED! The Bounty Hunter guild has deemed the time you have spent working on this mission excessive and handed it off to another party...
entries.bonus_reward: The Bounty Hunter guild has paid you a bonus in the amount of:
entries.easy_reward: The Bounty Hunter guild has reduced your mission amount for eliminating a trivial target.
entries.target_located_mustafar: Your target has been located on Mustafar.
entries.mission_target_updated: Transmission Received: Mission target location has been updated. Continue to the new waypoint
entries.mission_target_updated_exact: Transmission Received: Mission Target has been located. Mission waypoint has been updated to exact location
entries.jedi_mission_start_failed: This mission is no longer available. The maximum number of bounty hunters have already been assigned to that target.
entries.no_seek_mustafar: Due to unusually high heat readings and magnetic interference on Mustafar, your droid is unable to pinpoint your target.
entries.target_located_space_yavin4: Your target has been located in Yavin IV space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.target_located_space_dantooine: Your target has been located in Dantooine space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.target_located_space_endor: Your target has been located in Endor space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.target_located_space_tatooine: Your target has been located in Tatooine space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.target_located_space_rori: Your target has been located in Rori space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.target_located_space_talus: Your target has been located in Talus space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.target_located_space_naboo: Your target has been located in Naboo space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.target_located_space_dathomir: Your target has been located in Dathomir space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.target_located_space_corellia: Your target has been located in Corellia space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.target_located_space_lok: Your target has been located in Lok space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.no_seek: Your droid will not function on this planet.
entries.in_space: You must land on a planet to call a Probe Droid.
entries.target_location_stealth: While your target's biological signature has been detected, it is too faint to track.
entries.seeker_droid_standby: Biological signatures being assimilated. Please stand by.
entries.not_in_house: You must be outside to request the droid.
entries.bounty_on_nova_orion: Your probe droid has been destroyed! Last known location in the vicinity of the Nova Orion Station, Ord Mantell System.
entries.target_located_adventure1: Your target is hiding somewhere, most likely under ground or in space. You will have to try again later.
entries.target_located_space_kashyyyk: Your target has been located in Kashyyyk space.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on a planet's surface.
entries.target_located_space_nova_orion: Your target has been located on the Nova Orion space station.  You will not be able to collect the bounty until you find them on the space station.
entries.player_target_inactive: Monitors have picked up no signs of activity from the mission target.
entries.player_target_inaccessible: WARNING: The mission target has been located inside a structure that you are currently unable to enter.
